author: qsxzaqq

本帖最后由 qsxzaqq 于 2017-9-18 22:54 编辑 

官方介绍
LiteBans is a lightweight banning plugin supporting UUIDs which allows temporary and permanent bans. When a player changes their Minecraft name through Mojang, they will still keep their bans, mutes, and warnings.  All punishments made through LiteBans will take effect globally across all servers connected to the same database. Although LiteBans is designed to effectively synchronize between hundreds of servers, it can still work alone on a single server without a MySQL database.  LiteBans can run natively under Spigot and BungeeCord, offering the same features on both platforms. (The plugin can be installed in the Spigot plugin folder or the BungeeCord plugin folder.)

简介
,特可以对玩家进行封禁 提示 踢出等操作并且他可以查看玩家的封禁历史。可以自定义多种封禁通知格式他可以运行在Bukkit & Bungeecord 储存格式可以是MySQL & H2
